posts.post_content: I am new to net54baseball, and this is my first post. I collect J.D. McCarthy postcards of baseball Hall of Famers and stars, including variations (e.g., different cropping, different McCarthy logo placement, different reverse styles, etc.). Does anyone have any for sale? I also have McCarthy postcards to trade. Thank you.

Hi Will-

Welcome!  I sent you a PM.  This is one of my favorite "sets" so let's find a way to exchange some knowledge and do some trades/sales.  I have LOTS of JD McCarthy Postcards.

Thanks,
Derek

Thanks for your message, Derek. I replied by email. Please let me know if you don't get it.

Best,
Will

I have a few printing blocks used to make PCs - common Yankees.  I am pretty sure Mark Freeman is one. If there is any interest I will try to find them in all my clutter!

BuzzD
Thanks, Buzz, but I'm primarily interested in postcards of Hall of Famers.
I'm still seeking J.D. McCarthy postcards of baseball Hall of Famers for sale or trade.
